gradeComment.A: All required objects are specific and faithful to reference. Excellent attention to the varied softness or sharpness of edges on objects compared to reference.
gradeComment.C: Most of required objects are specific and faithful to reference. Very Good attention to the varied softness or sharpness of edges on objects compared to reference.
gradeComment.F: Few or hardly any objects are specific and faithful to reference; feel generic. Poor attention to the varied softness or sharpness of edges on objects compared to reference. Missing bevels on objects which still feel like block-ins in most of scene.

gradeComment.A: All appropriate objects created with criteria of different materials, construction methods or visible seams justifying separate pieces.
gradeComment.F: Hardly any appropriate objects created with criteria of different materials, construction methods or visible seams justifying separate pieces. Lots of block or brick modeling.

defaults.example_object_intro: Examples of concerns in this section are:
